rethink.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to think about a plan or idea again in order to decide if any changes should be made
rethink.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: an opportunity to rethink our policy on advertising
rethink.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to consider a plan or idea again carefully because it might need to be changed
rethink.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: If things get worse, the company may have to rethink itsstrategy.
